sqlMap.insert: insert into tech (tech_no, tech_title, tech_ques_content, tech_ans_content, tech_active, student_no, qtype_no) values (tech_no_seq.nextval, #title#, #quesContent#, #ansContent#, #active#, #student.no#, #qtypeNo#)
sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from tech where tech_active = 'Y'
and tech_title like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
and student_no in (select student_no from student where student_name like '%' || #keyword# || '%')
and B.student_no = #studentNo#

select "no" as no, "title" as title, "quesContent" as quesContent, "quesRegdate" as quesRegdate, "ansContent" as ansContent, "ansRegdate" as ansRegdate, "active" as active, "student.no" as "student.no", "qtypeNo" as qtypeNo from (select row_number() over (order by tech_no desc) m, A.tech_no as "no", A.tech_title as "title", A.tech_ques_content as "quesContent", A.tech_ques_regdate as "quesRegdate", A.tech_ans_content as "ansContent", A.tech_ans_regdate as "ansRegdate", A.tech_active as "active", B.student_no as "student.no", A.qtype_no as "qtypeNo" from tech A, student B where A.student_no = B.student_no and A.tech_active = 'Y'
and A.tech_title like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
and B.student_no in (select student_no from student where student_name like '%' || #keyword# || '%')
and B.student_no = #studentNo#
) where m >= #beginIndex# and m <= #endIndex#
sqlMap.update: update tech set tech_active = 'N' where tech_no = #value#
sqlMap.select: select A.tech_no as no, A.tech_title as title, A.tech_ques_content as quesContent, A.tech_ques_regdate as quesRegdate, A.tech_ans_content as ansContent, A.tech_ans_regdate as ansRegdate, A.tech_active as active, B.student_no as "student.no", B.student_name as "student.name", A.qtype_no as qtypeNo from tech A, student B where A.student_no = B.student_no and tech_no = #value#
sqlMap.update: update tech set tech_ans_content = #ansContent#, tech_ans_regdate = sysdate where tech_no = #no#
